text: Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (EYD: Basuki Cahaya Purnama, Hakka Chinese: ; born 29 June 1966), also known as Ahok, is an Indonesian politician, and businessperson. He is the current Governor of Jakarta, serving officially since 19 November 2014. He is the first governor to be a Christian and of ethnic Chinese descent. Basuki Tjahaja Purnama was born in Manggar, Bangka Belitung of the Bangkaâ€“Belitung Islands province. He is married to Veronica Tan and has three children. He is a Protestant. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Protestants Category:Bangka Belitung Islands
title: Basuki Tjahaja Purnama
